extendedInfo.description: Have your pictures on Picasa Web Albums or Google Plus Photos? Want to see your pictures more? This app will allow you to pick which albums you want to see photos from and periodically set your wallpaper to a random one of your pictures.This app has a very small resource footprint, to keep you battery lasting a long time.Has an option to use wifi only to save your cellular quotas.Choose from every 5 minutes, 30 minutes, hourly, or daily updating

reviews.title: Feature request
reviews.comment: This is a very good application. Looks like it gets a random photo from a random album. In some albums I have only a couple of photos. And this photos I see more often than others. The better way is to get random photo from all albums.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and great
reviews.comment: I\'m surprised by how much I like this wallpaper.  The only downside is that the picasa albums have to be public.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Public albums is the only problem for me
reviews.comment: Is it a way we can use this without our albums having to be public?  Other than that this is a great app.
reviews.author: SourPatch Kidd

reviews.title: Good for start
reviews.comment: Just what was looking for! I store all my photos, going back to childhood in Picasa, \" so it\'s nice to see them rotate via wallpaper.   One challenge I ran into is in selecting the albums I want to pull images from. I have a few hundred albums in Picasa and this program selected them ALL. There is no \"deselect\" function, so I had to uncheck every album I didn\'t want displayed. It would have been much easier the other way around.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t see private albums
reviews.comment: Only able to see public albums, but not able to see the private one.
reviews.author: Gary Leung

reviews.title: Good Idea but needs work
reviews.comment: Chops all the heads off my pictures. Doesn\'t resize to fit the background so all the heads get chopped off.  Samsung ultra transform.
reviews.author: A Google User
